channel.title: CVE Feed for M. Konieczny, DH9SB -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-49238|2024-10-18T13:37:01.808Z -- m.%20konieczny%2C%20dh9sb -- adif%20log%20search%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in M. Konieczny, DH9SB ADIF Log Search Widget allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects ADIF Log Search Widget: from n/a through 1.0f.
